casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Castellano, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. Castellano v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 525.]

(No. 98-822 Submitted September 15, 1998 Decided November 10, 1998.) Paul Mancino, Jr., for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and William J. McDonald, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
